team.bioHtml: I'm a pragmatic and disciplined so�ware engineer with over 12 years of experience of designing, developing and delivering cloud and distributed solutions. I

jobs.title: CEO / co-founder / investor
jobs.description:
Looking for a CEO for a new fintech product to run the business and pitching to the investors. The MVP is 90% ready. All the other details after signing NDA.

**Requirements**

You should have a tracked experience in startups and working as a product manager. Startup life at this stage is very hectic and very unpredictable that's why a startup experience is required. You don't have to have a CEO experience - if you have a good experience working as a product manager and want to do something bigger and being responsible for a company - this could be a right opportunity for you. Please note remote candidates are not accepted.

**Benefits**

No salary at this moment (only after raising funds), equity only (10% - 25%). Part-time.
